member.name: T:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueKind
member.summary:
The types of values.
Each type will comme with specific validators and converters

member.name: F:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueKind.None
member.summary: No type specified, will fallback to

member.name: F:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueKind.Integer
member.summary: The stored value will be an or a (16 or 32 bits number).

member.name: F:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueKind.Boolean
member.summary: The value will be a boolean (1 bit number).

member.name: F:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueKind.String
member.summary: The value will be considered a string.

member.name: F:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueKind.Entity
member.summary:
The value will refer to an entity, meaning a model from the application.
An implementation will be responsible to fetch the right entity. See for more information.

member.name: F:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueKind.DateTime
member.summary: The value is a to be treated as a DateTime

member.name: F:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueKind.Number
member.summary: The value will be a or (32 bits or 64 bits)

member.name: T:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueListKind
member.summary: Defines if the value is selected from a list and if it is a single or multiple selection

member.name: F:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueListKind.None
member.summary: No list

member.name: F:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueListKind.Single
member.summary: List with single element selection (ie : radio or dropdown)

member.name: F:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.EAVValueListKind.Multiple
member.summary: List with multiple element selection (ie : checkboxes or multiselect)

member.name: T:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.IEAVAttribute
member.summary:
Abstract class to be extended by EAV Attributes models.
An attribute is the configuration of a property stored in database. It defines :
witch should be unique and describe the attribute. ie : "BookDescription". It is comparable to a property name
witch describes the type of data stored. See for more information.
witch defines if the data is selected from a list. See for more information.
_______________ __________________ | EAVEntityBase | | EAVAttributeBase | |_______________| |__________________| | | | + AttributeName | | | | + ValueKind | | | | + ValueListKind | |_______________| |__________________| ^ ^ /_\ /_\ | | | | | | _______|_______ _________|________ | Book | | BookAttribute | |_______________| |__________________| | + Id | | + Id | | + Title | | | |_______________| |__________________|

member.name: P:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.IEAVAttribute.AttributeName
member.summary: The name of the attribute, should be considered as a property name and should be unique for an entity.

member.name: P:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.IEAVAttribute.ValueKind
member.summary: The type of value the for this attribute should store. See for more information.

member.name: P:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.IEAVAttribute.ValueListKind
member.summary: Defines the type of list used to hold the values. See for more information.

member.name: T:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.IEAVValue`2
member.summary:
This abstract class must be extended by models that represents a value for an entity's attribute.
A is the composition of an instance and an instance.
The stores the actual value as a raw string. The implementations will convert those values accordingly to the attribute's property.

member.name: P:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.IEAVValue`2.RawValue
member.summary: The value as stored in raw format.

member.name: P:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.IEAVValue`2.Attribute
member.summary: The attribute for witch the value is set

member.name: P:Kuchulem.DotNet.EntityAttributeValue.Abstractions.IEAVValue`2.Entity
member.summary: The entity for witch the value is set
